item.description: I am Herman Stevens, also known as igbuend. I wrote code on a TI58 calculator, a ZX Spectrum and an Amiga, installed Slackware Linux from 24 floppy disks, my first Usenet post was on 24 September 1990. I am a former developer, security consultant and PCI auditor. Now just a hacker.
